changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_equip_socket_option') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_equip_socket_option GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.remove_equip_socket_option @item_id dbo.id_t, @socket_slot_id TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DELETE FROM dbo.Equip_Item_Scoket_Infos WHERE inventory_id = @item_id AND socket_slot_id = @socket_slot_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_equip_socket_option') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_equip_socket_option GO
